summary: This document outlines the Articles of Organization and Operating Agreement for Prytanee, LLC, a limited liability company formed in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It details the management structure, membership interests, and operational guidelines for the company, including the roles of its members and trustee.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter certifies the existence of Prytanee, LLC in the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Brett Geary
persons.context: Brett Geary is identified as the organizer of Prytanee, LLC.

persons.name: Etienne Binant
persons.context: Etienne Binant is appointed as the initial manager of Prytanee, LLC.

persons.name: Caroline Sophie Camille Lang
persons.context: Caroline Sophie Camille Lang is the grantor and trustee of The Pierre Trust, which is a member of Prytanee, LLC.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is mentioned as the legal counsel for Southern Trust Company, a member of Prytanee, LLC.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is mentioned in the context of the dissolution of the company upon his death.

persons.name: Patrick Andre Jules Aurel Bernard
persons.context: Patrick Andre Jules Aurel Bernard is appointed as the successor trustee in the event of the current trustee's incapacity.

connections.description: Brett Geary organized Prytanee, LLC, and Etienne Binant is appointed as its manager.
Caroline Sophie Camille Lang, as trustee of The Pierre Trust, is involved in the management of Prytanee, LLC, where Etienne Binant is the manager.
Southern Trust Company, Inc. and The Pierre Trust, represented by Caroline Sophie Camille Lang, are both members of Prytanee, LLC.
Darren K. Indyke serves as legal counsel for Southern Trust Company, Inc.

events.title: Formation of Prytanee, LLC
events.description: Prytanee, LLC was formed and registered to conduct business in the Virgin Islands.

events.title: Trust Agreement for The Pierre Trust
events.description: The Pierre Trust Agreement was executed by Caroline Sophie Camille Lang.

events.title: EIN Assignment
events.description: The IRS assigned an Employer Identification Number to Southern Trust Company, Inc.

locations: Charlotte Amalie, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands
Royal Palms Professional Building, 62-3A & 62-38 Estate Thomas, Suite 101, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands
6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3 St. Thomas, VI 00802
keyFacts: Prytanee, LLC was formed on July 22, 2016.
Caroline Sophie Camille Lang is both the grantor and trustee of The Pierre Trust.
Etienne Binant is appointed as the manager of Prytanee, LLC.
Darren K. Indyke serves as legal counsel for Southern Trust Company, Inc.
The company will dissolve upon the death of Caroline Sophie Camille Lang or Jeffrey E. Epstein.
